sum by(topic) (irate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count{name=~"TotalProduceRequestsPerSec", job="msk", topic=~"$topic", instance=~"$broker", cluster_name=~"$cluster"}[5m]))

targets.expr: sort(sum by(topic) (irate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count{name=~"BytesOutPerSec", job="msk", topic=~"$topic", instance=~"$broker", cluster_name=~"$cluster"}[5m])))
sum by(instance) (irate(kafka_server_BrokerTopicMetrics_Count{name=~"BytesOutPerSec", job="msk", topic=~"$topic", instance=~"$broker", cluster_name=~"$cluster"}[5m]))
